snippet.title: Harmony's Odyssey - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Harmony’s Odyssey is a vibrant adventure puzzle game where the modern world mingles with mythology and comedy. Embark on a fantastic journey through fabled lands and restore peace to realms full of tangled puzzles created by a rowdy cat.

From the studio who brought you an award-winning Hexologic, comes a mythical adventure that feels suprisingly familiar. Meet creatures that got tangled in the ways of a young wizard called Harmony and her cat, that beyond all the yarns in the world, wants to play with a magic wand.

🎮 Harmony's Odyssey is coming to Nintendo Switch and Steam in 2022. 
⭐ Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1531490 ⭐

➡️ https://www.harmonysodyssey.com 

#HarmonysOdyssey​ #NintendoSwitch #Steam
